# κ°μ”

μ›κ°€-μ΅°μ—…λ„-μ΄μµ(Cost-Volume-Profit, CVP) λ¶„μ„μ—μ„ **μ΄μµ(Profit)**μ΄ μ΅°μ—…λ„(Volume), μ›κ°€(Cost)μ λ³€ν™”μ— μ–΄λ–»κ² λ³€ν™”ν•λ”μ§€ λ¶„μ„ν•λ” κ²½μν•™ κΈ°λ²•μΌλ΅ μ΄λ¥Ό ν†µν•΄μ„ λ©ν‘ μ΄μµ, λ©ν‘νλ§¤λ‰, λ©ν‘λ§¤μ¶μ•΅ λ“±μ„ μ‚°μ¶ν•΄λ³Ό μ μλ‹¤. νΉν, μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ μ— λ„λ‹¬ν•λ ¤λ©΄ λ‡κ°μ μƒν’μ„ ν”μ•„μ•Όν•λ”μ§€ λ¶„μ„ν•  μλ„ μλ‹¤.

μ›κ°€λ” κ³ μ •λΉ„μ™€ λ³€λ™λΉ„λ΅ κµ¬λ¶„ν•κ³  μ΄μµμ€ λ§¤μ¶μ—μ„ λΉ„μ©μ„ μ ν•λ©΄ κµ¬ν•  μκ³  μ΅°μ—…λ„(Volume)λ” κΈ°μ—…μ ν™λ™μ •λ„λ΅ μ ν’ μƒμ‚°λ‰, λ…Έλ™μ‹κ°„, κΈ°κ³„μ‘μ—…μ‹κ°„ λ“±μΌλ΅ μΈ΅μ •λλ‹¤.

- κµ¬μ„±μ”μ†
    - κ°€κ²©
    - νλ§¤λ‰
    - λ‹¨κ°€(Unit Variable Cost)
    - μ΄κ³ μ •λΉ„(Total Fixed Cost)
    - Product(Sales) Mix

* λ©ν‘μ΄μµ = (κ°€κ²© - λΉ„μ©) X λ©ν‘νλ§¤λ‰ - μ΄κ³ μ •λΉ„μ©

# μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ  λ°©λ²•

μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ ‘(Break-Even)μ€ μ΄μµλ„ μ†ν•΄λ„ μ—†λ” μƒν™©μΌλ΅ λ‹¤μ–‘ν• λ°©μ‹μΌλ΅ κ³„μ‚°μ„ ν•  μ μλ‹¤.

[μ¶μ²: [@cafferky2010breakeven] ]{.aside}

## μ΄λΉ„μ© λ°©λ²•

- μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ : μ΄λΉ„μ© = μ΄λ§¤μ¶
  - μ΄λΉ„μ© = κ³ μ •λΉ„μ© + λ³€λ™λΉ„μ©
  - μ΄λ§¤μ¶ = νλ§¤λ‰ X λ‹¨κ°€



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
#> β”€β”€ Attaching packages β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€ tidyverse 1.3.1 β”€β”€
#> β” ggplot2 3.3.6      β” purrr   0.3.4 
#> β” tibble  3.1.8      β” dplyr   1.0.10
#> β” tidyr   1.2.1      β” stringr 1.4.1 
#> β” readr   2.1.2      β” forcats 0.5.2
#> Warning: ν¨ν‚¤μ§€ 'tibble'λ” R λ²„μ „ 4.2.1μ—μ„ μ‘μ„±λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤
#> Warning: ν¨ν‚¤μ§€ 'tidyr'λ” R λ²„μ „ 4.2.1μ—μ„ μ‘μ„±λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤
#> Warning: ν¨ν‚¤μ§€ 'dplyr'λ” R λ²„μ „ 4.2.1μ—μ„ μ‘μ„±λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤
#> Warning: ν¨ν‚¤μ§€ 'stringr'λ” R λ²„μ „ 4.2.1μ—μ„ μ‘μ„±λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤
#> Warning: ν¨ν‚¤μ§€ 'forcats'λ” R λ²„μ „ 4.2.1μ—μ„ μ‘μ„±λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤
#> β”€β”€ Conflicts β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€β”€ tidyverse_conflicts() β”€β”€
#> β– dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
#> β– dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
library(testthat)
#> 
#> λ‹¤μμ ν¨ν‚¤μ§€λ¥Ό λ¶€μ°©ν•©λ‹λ‹¤: 'testthat'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr':
#> 
#>     matches
#> The following object is masked from 'package:purrr':
#> 
#>     is_null
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:readr':
#> 
#>     edition_get, local_edition
#> The following object is masked from 'package:tidyr':
#> 
#>     matches

fixed_costs    = 520000
variable_costs = 1105000
total_costs    = 1625000

test_that("μ΄μ›κ°€ = κ³ μ •λΉ„ + λ³€λ™λΉ„", {
  expect_equal(fixed_costs + variable_costs, total_costs)
})
#> Test passed π¥³

total_costs <- fixed_costs + variable_costs
total_revenue = 1625000

test_that("μ΄λ§¤μ¶ - μ΄μ›κ°€ = 0", {
  expect_equal(total_revenue - total_costs, 0)
})
#> Test passed π¥³
```
:::

  
  
## κ³µν—μ΄μµ λ°©λ²•

κ³µν—μ΄μµ(Contribution Margin)μ€ μ ν’κ°€μ—μ„ λ³€λ™λΉ„λ¥Ό λΊ€ κ°’μΌλ΅ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ ν‘ν„ν•λ‹¤.

$$\text{(λ‹¨μ„) κ³µν—μ΄μµ =  λ‹¨μ„ κ°€κ²© - λ‹¨μ„ λ³€λ™λΉ„}$$

- κ³ μ •λΉ„: 520,000
- λ‹¨μ„ κ°€κ²©: 25
- λ‹¨μ„ λ³€λ™λΉ„: 17
- (λ‹¨μ„) κ³µν—μ΄μµ: (25-17) = 8


λ¬Έμ λ” νλ§¤λ‰μ΄ μ–Όλ§κ°€ λμ–΄μ•Ό μµμ† μ†μ‹¤μ„ λ³΄μ§€ μ•κ² λ κΉ?
μμ‹μΌλ΅ ν‘ν„ν•λ©΄ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ κµ¬ν•  μ μλ‹¤.

$520,000 - (25-17) * volume = 0$

λ°©μ •μ‹μ„ ν’€λ©΄ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ κµ¬ν•  μ μλ‹¤.

$volume = \frac{520,000}{8} = 65,000$


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sales_fn <- function(volume) (25-17) * volume - 520000

be_volume <- uniroot(sales_fn, lower = 0, upper = 100000)$root
be_volume
#> [1] 65000
```
:::


μ‹κ°μ μΌλ΅ λ‚νƒ€λ‚΄λ©΄ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™λ‹¤.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tibble(volume = seq(0, 100000, 100)) %>% 
  mutate(profit = map_dbl(volume, sales_fn)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = volume, y = profit)) +
    geom_line() +
    scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
    theme_bw(base_family = "NanumGothic") +
  labs(title = "μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ  νλ§¤λ‰ - κ³µν—μ΄μµ λ°©λ²•",
       x = "νλ§¤λ‰",
       y = "μ΄μµ") +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray50") +
    geom_point(aes(x= be_volume, y = 0), size = 3, color = "blue") +
    annotate("text", x = 80000, y = -50000, 
             label = glue::glue("μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ : {scales::comma(be_volume)}"), 
             size = 5, color = "blue")

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
```

## λ©ν‘ μ΄μµ λ°©λ²•


μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ μ— λ§μ¶”λ” κ²ƒμ΄ λ©ν‘κ°€ μ•„λ‹κ³  μ‚¬μ—…μ—μ„λ” μ΄μµμ„ λ‚¨κΈ°λ” κ²ƒμ΄ λ©ν‘λΌμ„ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ λ©ν‘ μ΄μµμ„ λ”ν•μ—¬ λ©ν‘μ΄μµμ„ λ‹¬μ„±ν•λ”λ° ν•„μ”ν• νλ§¤μλ‰μ„ κ³„μ‚°ν•λ‹¤.

μλ¥Ό λ“¤μ–΄ κ³ μ •λΉ„(μ¦‰, ν¬μ)μ 10%λ¥Ό λ©ν‘λ΅ μ‚Όμ•„ λ©ν‘λ‹¬μ„±μ„ μ„ν•΄ ν•„μ”ν• νλ§¤λ‰μ„ κ³„μ‚°ν•΄λ³΄μ.


$$\text{λ©ν‘μ΄μµ λ‹¬μ„±μ„ μ„ν• νλ§¤μλ‰} = \frac{κ³ μ •λΉ„μ©+λ©ν‘μ΄μµ}{(λ‹¨μ„) κ³µν—μ΄μµ}$$

- κ³ μ •λΉ„: 520,000
- λ‹¨μ„ κ°€κ²©: 25
- λ‹¨μ„ λ³€λ™λΉ„: 17
- (λ‹¨μ„) κ³µν—μ΄μµ: (25-17) = 8
- λ©ν‘μ΄μµ: 52,000

μμ‹μΌλ΅ μ •λ¦¬ν•μ—¬ λ°©μ •μ‹μ„ ν’€λ©΄ νλ§¤λ‰μ„ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ κ³„μ‚°ν•  μ μλ‹¤.


$$\frac{520,000 + 52,000}{8} = 71,500$$

μ΄κ²ƒμ„ ν™•λ€ν•λ©΄ λ‹¤λ¥Έ μ‚¬ν•­λ„ κ³ λ ¤ν•μ—¬ λ©ν‘λ¥Ό λ‹¬μ„±ν•λ”λ° ν•„μ”ν• νλ§¤λ©ν‘μλ‰μ„ κ³„μ‚°ν•  μ μλ‹¤.


- κ³ μ •λΉ„: 520,000
- λ‹¨μ„ κ°€κ²©: 25
- λ‹¨μ„ λ³€λ™λΉ„: 17
- (λ‹¨μ„) κ³µν—μ΄μµ: (25-17) = 8
- μ΄μµκ΄€λ ¨ μ „μ²΄ λ©ν‘
    - λ©ν‘μ΄μµ: 52,000
    - μ°μ„ μ£Ό λ°°λ‹Ή: 13,000
    - μΌλ°μ£Ό λ°°λ‹Ή: 20,000

$$\frac{520,000 + 52,000 + 13,000 + 20,000}{8} = 75,625$$
    
ν”„λ΅κ·Έλλ°μ„ ν†µν•΄ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ κ³„μ‚°ν•  μ μλ‹¤.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fixed_costs = 520000
desired_profit = 52000
dividends_prefer = 13000
dividends_common = 20000

contribution_margin = (25-17)

cm_be_volume <- (fixed_costs + desired_profit + dividends_prefer + dividends_common) / contribution_margin

test_that("λ©ν‘μ΄μµ κ²€μ •", {
  expect_equal(cm_be_volume, 75625)
})
#> Test passed π¥³
```
:::


μ‹κ°ν™”λ¥Ό ν†µν•΄μ„ μƒκΈ° μ‚¬ν•­μ„ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™μ΄ ν™•μΈν•  μ μλ‹¤.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# κ³ μ •λΉ„, λ©ν‘μ΄μµ, λ°°λ‹Ή ν•¨μ --------
fixed_cost_fn <- function(volume) (25-17) * volume - 520000
desired_profit_fn <- function(volume) (25-17) * volume - 520000 - 52000
dividend_fn <- function(volume) (25-17) * volume - 520000 - 52000 - 13000 - 20000

# μ‹κ°ν™”λ¥Ό μ„ν• λ°μ΄ν„°ν”„λ μ„
goals_tbl <- tibble(volume = seq(0, 100000, 100)) %>% 
  mutate(fixed_cost    = map_dbl(volume, fixed_cost_fn),
         desired_profit = map_dbl(volume, desired_profit_fn),
         dividend       = map_dbl(volume, dividend_fn)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(fixed_cost:dividend) %>% 
  mutate(name = factor(name, levels = c("fixed_cost",
                                        "desired_profit",
                                        "dividend"),
                       labels = c("κ³ μ •λΉ„", "λ©ν‘μ΄μµ", "λ°°λ‹Ή")))


fixed_cost_bep <- uniroot(fixed_cost_fn, lower = 0, upper = 100000)$root
desired_profit_bep <- uniroot(desired_profit_fn, lower = 0, upper = 100000)$root
dividend_bep <- uniroot(dividend_fn, lower = 0, upper = 100000)$root

# μ‹κ°ν™”
goals_tbl %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = volume, y = value, color = name)) +
    geom_line() +
    scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
    theme_bw(base_family = "NanumGothic") +
  labs(title = "μ†μµλ¶„κΈ°μ  νλ§¤λ‰ - λ©ν‘μ΄μµλ‹¬μ„±",
       x = "νλ§¤λ‰",
       y = "μ΄μµ",
       color = "κµ¬λ¶„") +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "gray50") +
    geom_point(aes(x= fixed_cost_bep, y = 0), size = 3, color = "blue") +
    geom_point(aes(x= desired_profit_bep, y = 0), size = 3, color = "green") +
    geom_point(aes(x= dividend_bep, y = 0), size = 3, color = "red") +
    annotate("text", x = 55000, y = 50000, 
             label = glue::glue("{scales::comma(fixed_cost_bep)}"), 
             size = 4.5, color = "blue") +
    annotate("text", x = 85000, y = 30000, 
             label = glue::glue("{scales::comma(desired_profit_bep)}"), 
             size = 4.5, color = "green") +
    annotate("text", x = 85000, y = -50000, 
             label = glue::glue("{scales::comma(dividend_bep)}"), 
             size = 4.5, color = "red") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "green", "red")) 
#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤

#> Warning in grid.Call(C_textBounds, as.graphicsAnnot(x$label), x$x, x$y, : μλ„μ°
#> μ¦ ν°νΈλ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ—μ„ μ°Ύμ„ μ μ—†λ” ν°νΈνλ°€λ¦¬μ…λ‹λ‹¤
```

# κ³ μ •λΉ„μ™€ λ³€λ™λΉ„ κµ¬λ¶„

κ³ μ •λΉ„μ™€ λ³€λ™λΉ„λ¥Ό κµ¬λ¶„ν•  μ μμΌλ©΄ μμµλ¶„κΈ°μ μ„ μ¶”μ •ν•λ”λ° ν° λ„μ›€μ΄ λλ‹¤. 
λ€ν‘μ μΈ λ°©λ²•μΌλ΅ μ„ ν•νκ·€μ‹μ„ ν†µν•΄ κ³ μ •λΉ„μ™€ λ³€λ™λΉ„λ¥Ό μ¶”μ •ν•  μ μλ‹¤.

μ„ ν•νκ·€μ‹μ„ κ³„μ‚°ν•λ”λ° ν•„μ”ν• κ²ƒμ΄ λ°μ΄ν„°λ‹¤. λ§μ•½, νλ§¤λ‰κ³Ό μ΄λΉ„μ©μ— λ€ν• λ°μ΄ν„°κ°€ κ΄€μΈ΅μ λ³„λ΅ μ¤€λΉ„λμ–΄ μλ‹¤λ©΄ μ΄λ¥Ό ν™μ©ν•μ—¬ μƒλ€μ μΌλ΅ λ°μ΄ν„°μ— κΈ°λ°ν•μ—¬ κ³ μ •λΉ„μ™€ λ³€λ™λΉ„λ¥Ό μ •ν™•ν λ„μ¶ν•  μ μλ‹¤. μ¦‰, μ—°λ„λ³„ μ΄λΉ„μ© λ°μ΄ν„°μ™€ νλ§¤λ‰ λ°μ΄ν„°λ¥Ό ν†µν•΄ κ³ μ •λΉ„μ™€ λ³€λ™λΉ„λ¥Ό μ„ ν•νκ·€λ¨ν•μ„ ν†µν•΄ μ¶”μ •ν•  μ μλ‹¤.

$$Y_{μ΄λΉ„μ©} = \alpha_{κ³ μ •λΉ„μ©} + \beta_{λ³€λ™λΉ„} \times νλ§¤λ‰$$


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
#> Warning: ν¨ν‚¤μ§€ 'broom'λ” R λ²„μ „ 4.2.1μ—μ„ μ‘μ„±λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤

cost_tbl <- tribble(~"μ—°λ„", ~ "νλ§¤λ‰", ~"μ΄λΉ„μ©",
                    2010, 160, 2700,
                    2011, 170, 2795,
                    2012, 150, 2610,
                    2013, 140, 2500,
                    2014, 180, 2800)

cost_lm <- lm(μ΄λΉ„μ© ~ νλ§¤λ‰, data = cost_tbl)
  
coef_tbl <- broom::tidy(cost_lm)

fixed_cost_intercept <- coef_tbl %>% filter(term == "(Intercept)") %>% pull(estimate)

variable_cost_slope <- coef_tbl %>% filter(term == "νλ§¤λ‰") %>% pull(estimate)
```
:::



μƒκΈ° λ°μ΄ν„°λ¥Ό ν†µν•΄ ν•΄λ‹Ή κΈ°μ—… λ³€λ™λΉ„μ™€ κ³ μ •λΉ„λ¥Ό μ¶”μ •ν•λ©΄ λ‹¤μκ³Ό κ°™λ‹¤.

$$Y_{μ΄λΉ„μ©} = 1,425 + 7.85 \times νλ§¤λ‰$$

- κ³ μ •λΉ„μ©: 1,425
- λ³€λ™λΉ„μ©: 7.85
